dct_title_s: Tourist map of Bombay / produced for the Department of Tourism, Government of India by the India Tourism Development Corporation.
dct_description_sm: Panel title: India, Bombay city map. Includes index to points of interest. Text, list of tourist offices, color illustration, and description of places of interest on verso. Maps on verso, with indexes: Fort Bombay -- Greater Bombay city and suburbs. "January 1978." "Based upon Survey of India maps, with the permission of the Surveyor General of India ... Government of India copyright 1977."
